articles.content: MIAMI -- Philadelphia 76ers superstar Joel Embiid congratulated Nikola Jokic on winning the NBA Most Valuable Player Award for a second straight season, adding Tuesday night that there was "no right … [+5375 chars]

articles.title: Charlie Adam: Is this a tearful farewell for box-office Dundee midfielder? - BBC
articles.description: BBC Scotland looks at whether Dundee's veteran midfielder Charlie Adam should hang up his boots after a box-office fortnight.
articles.content:
You always get the sense that something might happen when Charlie Adam is on the pitch.

articles.author: Kate Mcgreavy
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand slams Manchester United for 'weak-minded changing room' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ralf Rangnick's side hit a new low on Saturday  when they were humiliated in a 4-0 thrashing by Brighton. The defeat means United will finish with their lowest points tally in the post-1992 era.
articles.content: Rio Ferdinand has not held back in his latest criticism of Manchester United's faltering stars as he labelled the dressing room 'weak-minded' and insisted their leaders should be singling out others … [+5046 chars]
